ProductInfo.Features:
It is a high performance security DVR System. Includes 4 600TVL high resolution cameras with superior night vision up to 65ft for indoor and outdoor use.
View all cameras live or playback in high resolution on your monitor through VGA, BNC, or HDMI connection.
Fashinable design. Control at your fingertips with live view and playback surveillance in your palms via 3G/4G enabled Smartphones, tablets, PCs, Macs, and set email notifications.
Save time and energy to feel secure with easy view and store incident videos to external USB back up storage. High performance with low consumption.
Plug and forget by continuous recording from 4 cameras up to 30 days on a 500GB surveillance grade hard drive, extend longer with motion detection triggered recording.
ProductInfo.Name: Guardian In-KDV1404B6BP H.264 4 Channel DVR with 4 600TVL Infrared Night Vision Cameras and 500GB Hard Drive Preinstalled Internet & 3G Phone Accessible Security Surveillance CCTV System DVR Kit (Black)
